Name: juvenile absence epilepsy
Definition: An adolescence-adult electroclinical syndrome statring between the age of ten to 17 years characterized by the occurrence of typical absence seizures.

Name: epilepsy with generalized tonic-clonic seizures
Definition: An adolescence-adult electroclinical syndrome starting in adolescence exhibiting generalized tonic-clonic seizures as the only seizure type.

Name: obsolete chronic allograft arteriopathy
Definition: An adolescence-adult electroclinical syndrome starting in adolescence exhibiting generalized tonic-clonic seizures as the only seizure type.
